text: “Akukufunsa (Asilamu) chomwe chaloledwa kwa iwo (kudya). Nena: “Chaloledwa kwa inu chilichonse chabwino. Ndi (chimene chagwidwa ndi) nyama kapena mbalame zaukali zomwe mwaziphunzitsa kusaka. Muziphunzitse zimene Allah wakuphunzitsani. Choncho idyani chimene zakugwilirani, ndipo chitchulireni dzina la Allah pochikhwirizira. Ndipo opani Allah. Ndithudi Allah Ngwachangu pakuwerengera
